name: PomboTroll
description: PomboTroll is an extremely fun 2D game. Fly on the wings of a pigeon and earn points pooping and vomiting on other birds. Challenge other players for a gross battle and be the biggest troll pigeon of all!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 80 MB available space
